sys_update_xml.name: sys_web_service_7e7d20200f6fd240a8586509b1050ed2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_web_service"><sys_web_service action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><function_name>execute</function_name><name>EbondingIncident</name><scoped_name>EbondingIncident</scoped_name><script><![CDATA[try{
	
	var licenceKey = request.licenceKey;
	var message = request.message;
	
	gs.log("incoming request licence key" + licenceKey);
	gs.log("incoming request message" + message);
	//==========checking if the license key belongs to DecisionOne
	if (licenceKey == gs.getProperty('descisionone_licenceKey')){
		
		var incEbond = new incidentEbondingD1();
		var res = incEbond.eventCodeCheck(message,'D1');
		response.status = res;
	}
	//**********checking if the license key belongs to A&O*******
	else if(licenceKey == gs.getProperty('AandO_licensekey')){
		
		var incEbond = new incidentEbondingD1();
		var res = incEbond.eventCodeCheck(message,'AO');
		response.status = res;
		
	} else {
		response.status = '400';
	}
	
}
catch (err){
	gs.log('Error Script Include running stopped');
	var object = res.inc_gr;
	gs.eventQueue('d1.licenceKeyerror', object, 'ERR102');
}

]]></script><short_description>Incident update by D1 using this web service call</short_description><sys_class_name>sys_web_service</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>deepti.dixit</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-05-19 05:56:28</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>7e7d20200f6fd240a8586509b1050ed2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>60</sys_mod_count><sys_name>EbondingIncident</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_web_service_7e7d20200f6fd240a8586509b1050ed2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>sivaranjani.duvvuri</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-06-22 10:11:00</sys_updated_on><wsdl>https://barddev.service-now.com/EbondingIncident.do?WSDL</wsdl></sys_web_service></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_72b699350f2f1640a8586509b1050e94
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.incidentEbondingD1</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Updating Incident from the XML Document for AandO and D1</description><name>incidentEbondingD1</name><script><![CDATA[var incidentEbondingD1 = Class.create();
incidentEbondingD1.prototype = {
	_initialize: function() {
		
	},
	
	eventCodeCheck: function(message,temp) {
		try {
			var xmlDoc = new XMLDocument(message, true);
			
			//reading the values from the XML document
			var custktNode = xmlDoc.getNodeText('//Custkt');
			var eventCodeNode = xmlDoc.getNodeText('//EventCode');
			var commentNode = xmlDoc.getNodeText('//Comment');
			var callStatusNode = xmlDoc.getNodeText('//CallStatus');
			var decisiononenumber = xmlDoc.getNodeText('//Ventkt');
			var statext = xmlDoc.getNodeText('//Statext');
			var Assignedto = xmlDoc.getNodeText('//FEName');
			var usrID = xmlDoc.getNodeText('//FENum');
			var servicetype = xmlDoc.getNodeText('//ServiceType');
			var eta = xmlDoc.getNodeText('//Eta');
			var resolution = xmlDoc.getNodeText('//ResolutionCode');
			var closenotes = xmlDoc.getNodeText('//Fixtext');
			var arrive = xmlDoc.getNodeText('//Arrive');
			
			
			
			var inc_gr = new GlideRecord('incident');
			inc_gr.addQuery('number', custktNode);
			inc_gr.addQuery('active', true);
			inc_gr.query();
			
			var newComment;
			var usr = this.findUser(usrID); //getting sys_id of the user
			if (custktNode!='' && inc_gr.hasNext()) {
				inc_gr.next();
				gs.log("evnt Code: "+eventCodeNode);
				
				//Acknolwedgment from decision one to service now
				if(eventCodeNode) {
					gs.log('inside');
					//check for mandatory data for event AC, if not found throw error 101
					if(eventCodeNode == 'OC'){
						if (decisiononenumber != '') {
							inc_gr.comments = commentNode;
							inc_gr.setValue('u_decision_one_number' , decisiononenumber);
							inc_gr.setValue('state' , 9);
							inc_gr.update();
						} else {
							gs.eventQueue('d1Mandatoryerror' , inc_gr , 'ERR101');
						}
						return "202";
					}
					
					// D1 to Snow when the incident is assigned to a user
					if (eventCodeNode == 'AC') {
						//check for mandatory data for event AC, if not found throw error 101
						gs.log('event matched');
						if (usr != '') {
							gs.log('updating');
							inc_gr.comments = commentNode;
							inc_gr.setValue('assigned_to', usr);
							inc_gr.setValue('state' , 2);
							inc_gr.setValue('u_decision_one_number' , decisiononenumber);
							inc_gr.update();
						} else {
							gs.eventQueue('d1Mandatoryerror' , inc_gr , 'ERR101');
							gs.log('Error 101 loged');
						}
						return "202";
						
					}
					
					//reading response for comments update
					else if(eventCodeNode == 'ET' || eventCodeNode == 'CB' || eventCodeNode == 'ER'){
						if(eta != null || eta != 'null' || eta != ''){
							newComment = commentNode + eta;
						} else {
							newComment = commentNode;
						}
						inc_gr.comments = newComment;
						inc_gr.update();
						
						gs.log('TTTT2 record udpated');
						return "202";
					}
					
					//reading response for status update
					else if (eventCodeNode == 'CA'){
						inc_gr.comments = commentNode;
						inc_gr.setValue('state' , 8); //change state to inProgress
						inc_gr.update();
						return "202";
					}
					
					//reading response for incident resolved
					else if(eventCodeNode == 'CC'){
						if(eta != null || eta != 'null'){
							newComment = commentNode + eta;
						} else {
							newComment = commentNode;
						}
						inc_gr.comments = newComment;
						//check for mandatory data for event AC, if not found throw error 101
						if( temp == 'D1'){
							if (resolution != '' && closenotes != '') {
								inc_gr.setValue('state' ,6); //change state to Resolved
								inc_gr.setValue('close_code', resolution);
								inc_gr.setValue('comments', closenotes);
								inc_gr.update();
							} else {
								gs.eventQueue('d1Mandatoryerror' , inc_gr , 'ERR101');
								gs.log('Error 101 loged');
							}
						}
						else {
							if (resolution != '' && closenotes != '') {
								inc_gr.setValue('state' ,6); //change state to Resolved
								inc_gr.setValue('close_code', commentNode);
								inc_gr.setValue('comments', commentNode);
								inc_gr.update();
							} else {
								gs.eventQueue('d1Mandatoryerror' , inc_gr , 'ERR101');
								gs.log('Error 101 loged');
							}
						}
						gs.log('record udpated');
						return "202";
					}
				} else {
					//if no valid event found throw error 103
					gs.eventQueue('incident.d1error' , inc_gr , 'ERR103');
					gs.log('Error 103 loged');
				}
			}
			//return "400";
		}
		catch(e) {
			gs.log('Exception in SI: incidentEbondingD1 @ line #'+e.lineNumber+', message: '+e.message);
			gs.eventQueue('incident.d1error' , inc_gr , 'ERR103');
		}
	},
	
	findUser: function(uid){
		// function to fetch the sys_id of assigned to user
		
		var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		gr.addEncodedQuery('user_name='+uid);
		gr.query();
		if(gr.hasNext()) {
			gr.next();
			gs.log('sys_id' + gr.sys_id + ' ' + uid);
			return gr.sys_id;// return User sys_id
		}else return '';//return empty if no match found
	},
	
	type: 'incidentEbondingD1'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>puneeth.r</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-05-23 06:13:48</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>72b699350f2f1640a8586509b1050e94</sys_id><sys_mod_count>53</sys_mod_count><sys_name>incidentEbondingD1</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_72b699350f2f1640a8586509b1050e94</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>sivaranjani.duvvuri</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-06-22 10:04:26</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_df3a53ea0f3f5200a8586509b1050e3e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>true</execute_function><filter_condition table="incident">assignment_group=8cd808fe0f6a9a002033a218b1050e35^sys_updated_by!=AnOSOAP^sys_updated_by!=soap user^assignment_groupVALCHANGES^EQ<item display_table="sys_user_group" display_value="A&O_DISPATCH_SUPPORT" endquery="false" field="assignment_group" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="8cd808fe0f6a9a002033a218b1050e35"/><item endquery="false" field="sys_updated_by" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="!=" or="false" value="AnOSOAP"/><item endquery="false" field="sys_updated_by" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="!=" or="false" value="soap user"/><item endquery="false" field="assignment_group" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><message/><name>AandO Integration Insert</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[function onAfter(current, previous) {
	//This function will be automatically called when this rule is processed.
	try {
		gs.log(current.priority + '=================in incident creation=============' + previous.priority);
		var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('AandO', 'post');
		r.setStringParameter('Action', 'CreateTicket');
		r.setStringParameter('TicketType', 'Incident');
		r.setStringParameter('Category', current.category);
		r.setStringParameter('Description', current.description);
		r.setStringParameter('HomePhone', current.caller_id.phone);
		r.setStringParameter('LocationID', current.cmdb_ci.location.u_bard_sitenumber.u_site_number);
		r.setStringParameter('Location', current.cmdb_ci.location);
		r.setStringParameter('Street', current.cmdb_ci.location.street);
		r.setStringParameter('City', current.cmdb_ci.location.city);
		r.setStringParameter('ZIPCode', current.cmdb_ci.location.postal_code);
		r.setStringParameter('State/Province', current.cmdb_ci.location.state);
		r.setStringParameter('Country', current.cmdb_ci.location.country);
		r.setStringParameter('Email', current.cmdb_ci.email);
		r.setStringParameter('Number', current.number);
		r.setStringParameter('Company', 'Bard');
		r.setStringParameter('ReportedBy', current.caller_id.getDisplayValue());
		var priority = '';
		if(current.priority == '1')
			priority = 'P1';
		else if (current.priority == '2')
			priority = 'P2';
		else if(current.priority == '3')
			priority = 'P3';
		else if(current.priority == '4')
			priority = 'P4';
		r.setStringParameter('Priority', priority);
		r.setStringParameter('ShortDescription', current.short_description);
		r.setStringParameter('Subcategory', current.subcategory);
		r.setStringParameter('ConfigurationItem', current.cmdb_ci.name);
		var response = r.execute();
		var responseBody = response.getBody();
		var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();
		gs.log('status code of integration New ' + httpStatus);
		gs.log('====Response Body of Integration===' + responseBody);
		if (httpStatus == '200') {
			current.u_decision_one_number = responseBody;
			current.state = 9;
			current.update();
		}
	}
	catch(ex) {
		var message = ex.getMessage();
	}
	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>sivaranjani.duvvuri</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-06-07 09:55:08</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>df3a53ea0f3f5200a8586509b1050e3e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>37</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AandO Integration Insert</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_df3a53ea0f3f5200a8586509b1050e3e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>sivaranjani.duvvuri</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-06-22 10:10:05</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=df3a53ea0f3f5200a8586509b1050e3e"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_df3a53ea0f3f5200a8586509b1050e3e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>true</execute_function><filter_condition table="incident">assignment_group=8cd808fe0f6a9a002033a218b1050e35^sys_updated_by!=AnOSOAP^sys_updated_by!=soap user^assignment_groupVALCHANGES^EQ<item display_table="sys_user_group" display_value="A&O_DISPATCH_SUPPORT" endquery="false" field="assignment_group" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="8cd808fe0f6a9a002033a218b1050e35"/><item endquery="false" field="sys_updated_by" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="!=" or="false" value="AnOSOAP"/><item endquery="false" field="sys_updated_by" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="!=" or="false" value="soap user"/><item endquery="false" field="assignment_group" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><message/><name>AandO integration Insert</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[	function onAfter(current, previous) {
	//This function will be automatically called when this rule is processed.
	try {
		gs.log(current.priority + '=================in incident creation=============' + previous.priority);
		var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('AandO', 'post');
		r.setStringParameter('Action', 'CreateTicket');
		r.setStringParameter('TicketType', 'Incident');
		r.setStringParameter('Category', current.category);
		r.setStringParameter('Description', current.description);
		r.setStringParameter('HomePhone', current.caller_id.phone);
		r.setStringParameter('LocationID', '98884');
		r.setStringParameter('Location', current.location);
		r.setStringParameter('Street', current.caller_id.location.street);
		r.setStringParameter('City', current.location.city);
		r.setStringParameter('ZIPCode', current.caller_id.location.postal_code);
		r.setStringParameter('State/Province', current.caller_id.location.state);
		r.setStringParameter('Country', current.caller_id.location.country);
		r.setStringParameter('Email', current.caller_id.email);
		r.setStringParameter('Number', current.number);
		r.setStringParameter('Company', 'Bard');
		r.setStringParameter('ReportedBy', current.caller_id.getDisplayValue());
		var priority = '';
		if(current.priority == '1')
			priority = 'P1';
		else if (current.priority == '2')
			priority = 'P2';
		else if(current.priority == '3')
			priority = 'P3';
		else if(current.priority == '4')
			priority = 'P4';
		r.setStringParameter('Priority', priority);
		r.setStringParameter('ShortDescription', current.short_description);
		r.setStringParameter('Subcategory', current.subcategory);
		r.setStringParameter('ConfigurationItem', current.cmdb_ci.name);
		var response = r.execute();
		var responseBody = response.getBody();
		var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();
		gs.log('status code of integration New ' + httpStatus);
		gs.log('response Body' + responseBody);
		if (httpStatus == '200') {
			current.u_decision_one_number = responseBody;
			current.state = 9;			
			current.update();
		}
	}
	catch(ex) {
		var message = ex.getMessage();
	}
	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>sivaranjani.duvvuri</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-06-07 09:55:08</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>df3a53ea0f3f5200a8586509b1050e3e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>34</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AandO integration Insert</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_df3a53ea0f3f5200a8586509b1050e3e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>puneeth.r</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-06-17 11:32:56</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=df3a53ea0f3f5200a8586509b1050e3e"/></record_update>

	//This function will be automatically called when this rule is processed.
	try {
		var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('AandO', 'post');
		r.setStringParameter('Action', 'AddComment');
		r.setStringParameter('Description', current.description);
		r.setStringParameter('Number', current.number);

		var response = r.execute();
		var responseBody = response.getBody();

}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>sivaranjani.duvvuri</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-06-13 09:55:19</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>5632562c0fc4e200a8586509b1050e1d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AnO Comments Update</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_5632562c0fc4e200a8586509b1050e1d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>deepti.dixit</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-06-16 11:15:15</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=5632562c0fc4e200a8586509b1050e1d"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>true</execute_function><filter_condition table="incident">commentsVALCHANGES^sys_updated_by!=AnOSOAP^sys_updated_by!=soap user^u_decision_one_numberISNOTEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="comments" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="sys_updated_by" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="!=" or="false" value="AnOSOAP"/><item endquery="false" field="sys_updated_by" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="!=" or="false" value="soap user"/><item endquery="false" field="u_decision_one_number" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><message/><name>AandO Comments Update</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[function onAfter(current, previous) {
	//Business rule will run when comments are updated in the incident record.
	try {
		var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('AandO', 'post');
		r.setStringParameter('Action', 'AddComment');
		r.setStringParameter('Description', current.description);
		r.setStringParameter('Number', current.number);
		r.setStringParameter('FVTicketID' ,current.u_decision_one_number);
		r.setStringParameter('Comment', current.comments.getJournalEntry(1));
		r.setStringParameter('UpdatedBy', current.sys_updated_by.getDisplayValue());
		
		var response = r.execute();
		var responseBody = response.getBody();
		var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();
		
		gs.log(responseBody + '====status code of integration Comments update===== ' + httpStatus);
	}
	catch(ex) {
		var message = ex.getMessage();
	}
	
	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>sivaranjani.duvvuri</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-06-13 09:55:19</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>5632562c0fc4e200a8586509b1050e1d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>16</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AandO Comments Update</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_5632562c0fc4e200a8586509b1050e1d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>sivaranjani.duvvuri</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-06-22 10:09:48</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=5632562c0fc4e200a8586509b1050e1d"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_0118a7ae0f3f5200a8586509b1050e96
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>true</execute_function><filter_condition table="incident">priorityVALCHANGES^assignment_group=8cd808fe0f6a9a002033a218b1050e35^sys_updated_by!=AnOSOAP^sys_updated_by!=soap user^u_decision_one_numberISNOTEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="priority" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item display_table="sys_user_group" display_value="A&O_DISPATCH_SUPPORT" endquery="false" field="assignment_group" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="8cd808fe0f6a9a002033a218b1050e35"/><item endquery="false" field="sys_updated_by" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="!=" or="false" value="AnOSOAP"/><item endquery="false" field="sys_updated_by" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="!=" or="false" value="soap user"/><item endquery="false" field="u_decision_one_number" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><message/><name>Priority change AandO</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[function onAfter(current, previous) {
	//This function will be automatically called when this rule is processed.
	gs.log(current.priority + '=================in priority update=============' + previous.priority);
	try {
		if (current.priority != previous.priority) {
			var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('AandO', 'post');
			r.setStringParameter('Action', 'UpdateTicket');
			r.setStringParameter('Description', current.description);
			r.setStringParameter('FVTicketID' ,current.u_decision_one_number);
			r.setStringParameter('Number', current.number);
			r.setStringParameter('LocationID', '98884');
			var priority = '';
			if(current.priority == '1')
				priority = 'P1';
			else if (current.priority == '2')
				priority = 'P2';
			else if(current.priority == '3')
				priority = 'P3';
			else if(current.priority == '4')
				priority = 'P4';
			r.setStringParameter('Priority', priority);
			r.setStringParameter('UpdatedBy', current.sys_updated_by.getDisplayValue());
			
			var response = r.execute();
			var responseBody = response.getBody();
			var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();
			gs.log(responseBody + '===status code of integration Priority update ' + httpStatus + priority);
		}
	}
	catch(ex) {
		var message = ex.getMessage();
	}
	
	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>sivaranjani.duvvuri</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-06-07 10:55:05</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>0118a7ae0f3f5200a8586509b1050e96</sys_id><sys_mod_count>20</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Priority change AandO</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_0118a7ae0f3f5200a8586509b1050e96</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>saumyan</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-06-16 10:47:21</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=0118a7ae0f3f5200a8586509b1050e96"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_0118a7ae0f3f5200a8586509b1050e96
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>true</execute_function><filter_condition table="incident">priorityVALCHANGES^assignment_group=8cd808fe0f6a9a002033a218b1050e35^sys_updated_by!=AnOSOAP^sys_updated_by!=soap user^u_decision_one_numberISNOTEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="priority" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item display_table="sys_user_group" display_value="A&O_DISPATCH_SUPPORT" endquery="false" field="assignment_group" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="8cd808fe0f6a9a002033a218b1050e35"/><item endquery="false" field="sys_updated_by" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="!=" or="false" value="AnOSOAP"/><item endquery="false" field="sys_updated_by" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="!=" or="false" value="soap user"/><item endquery="false" field="u_decision_one_number" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><message/><name>AandO Priority Update</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[function onAfter(current, previous) {
	//This function will be automatically called when this rule is processed.
	try {
		
		if (current.priority != previous.priority && (previous.priority!='0' || previous.priority!='') ) {
			var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('AandO', 'post');
			r.setStringParameter('Action', 'UpdateTicket');
			r.setStringParameter('Description', current.description);
			r.setStringParameter('FVTicketID' ,current.u_decision_one_number);
			r.setStringParameter('Number', current.number);
			r.setStringParameter('LocationID', '98884');
			
			var priority = '';
			if(current.priority == '1')
				priority = 'P1';
			else if (current.priority == '2')
				priority = 'P2';
			else if(current.priority == '3')
				priority = 'P3';
			else if(current.priority == '4')
				priority = 'P4';
			r.setStringParameter('Priority', priority);
			r.setStringParameter('UpdatedBy', current.sys_updated_by.getDisplayValue());
			
			var response = r.execute();
			var responseBody = response.getBody();
			var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();
			gs.log(responseBody + '=== status code of integration Priority update===' + httpStatus + priority);
		}
	}
	catch(ex) {
		var message = ex.getMessage();
	}
	
	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>sivaranjani.duvvuri</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-06-07 10:55:05</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>0118a7ae0f3f5200a8586509b1050e96</sys_id><sys_mod_count>25</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AandO Priority Update</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_0118a7ae0f3f5200a8586509b1050e96</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>sivaranjani.duvvuri</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-06-22 10:09:35</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=0118a7ae0f3f5200a8586509b1050e96"/></record_update>
